title: GET_ENTITY_TYPE
content:
0xB1BD08D// GetEntityType
int GET_ENTITY_TYPE(Entity entity);Parameters:entity: The entity to get the type of.Returns: The entity type returned as an integer value.Gets the entity type (as an integer), which can be one of the following defined down below:The following entities will return type 1:PedPlayerAnimal (Red Dead Redemption 2)Horse (Red Dead Redemption 2)The following entities will return type 2:AutomobileBikeBoatHeliPlaneSubmarineTrailerTrainDraftVeh (Red Dead Redemption 2)The following entities will return type 3:ObjectDoorPickupOtherwise, a value of 0 will be returned.
